description: Requirement:The consultant is responsible for the designing a replacement of the existing Dixon & Walker bridges within Grasslands National Park, West Block. The purpose is to design larger and higher bridges which will allow for larger vehicles, and minimize impacts of flooding on the bridge itself.",
full_summary:
### Design for Replacement of Dixon and Walker Bridges, Grasslands National Park

**Announcement**
A qualified consultant is required to design a replacement for the existing Dixon and Walker bridges within Grasslands National Park, West Block. The purpose of this project is to design larger and higher bridges that can accommodate larger vehicles, minimizing potential flooding impacts on the bridge.

**Project Requirements**

*   Design larger and higher bridges to accommodate larger vehicles
*   Minimize impacts of flooding on the bridge
*   Ensure compliance with National Park Act

**Site Visit**

An optional site visit is scheduled for **September 15, 2022 at 2:00 PM CST** at the parking lot in front of the Visitor Centre in Val Marie, SK, located near Highway 4 (101 Centre St, Val Marie, SK S0N 2T0).

Participants are required to wear proper steel-toed boots and high-vis vests. Representatives who do not meet the safety attire requirement may be denied access to the site.

**Bidder Requirements**

*   Submit written inquiries of technical and contractual nature to the Contracting Authority
*   Attend the site visit to clarify any project-related questions
*   Provide updates on attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend

**Bid Submission Guidelines**

*   Submit proposals through email to **soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca**
*   Proposals received via fax and email will be accepted as official
*   Files submitted via email must not exceed 15 MB
*   Technical and contractual inquiries must be submitted at least 8 business days prior to the deadline
*   Late submissions will not be considered

**Supporting Documents**

Supporting documents are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service, [www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/).

Contact Information:

*   For technical and contractual inquiries, contact **Grad without dJack Marketing.mm@ Gen socifiedos.calppowel ** at **1-855-983-1808**
*   For bid submissions, submit emails to **soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca**.
